name: SpaceBus 1999: Sagas of the millenial star transporters from Ganymede | Chapter One: THE DEVICE
name_original: SpaceBus 1999: Sagas of the millenial star transporters from Ganymede | Chapter One: THE DEVICE
description:
In SpaceBus 1999: Sagas of the millenial star transporters from Ganymede | Chapter One: THE DEVICE you are an imperiled interplanetary bus driver from Ganymede, trying to keep yourself and your bus alive for as long as possible in a field of asteroids. Eventually, you will fail, but you can keep yourself alive with the help of the mysterious DEVICE.

But beware, the DEVICE is a fickle saviour, and it will set you a challenge to complete in return for your salvation. Worse still, if allowed to stand still, your bus will begin to overheat and damage itself! You must keep going, flying through the hail of asteroids, with only the DEVICE and your wits to help you.

Controls:

Left Arrow Key: Turn the bus left.

Right Arrow Key: Turn the bus right.

Up Arrow Key: Engage the engines.

Further instructions available in-game.
